profileUrl.title: Your Profile URL
profileUrl.setUsername: Set a username above to create your custom public profile URL

social.title: Social Profile
social.description: Manage your public profile and social settings

description.noUsername: Set a username first to make your profile public
description.public: Your profile and shared content will be visible to everyone
description.private: Your profile will only be visible to you

password.title: Password
password.descriptionNoPassword: Set a password for email/password login
password.noPasswordSet: You currently sign in with OAuth. Setting a password allows you to also log in with email/password.

removeDialog.title: Remove Password?
removeDialog.description: You will only be able to sign in using your connected OAuth accounts. This action cannot be undone.
removeDialog.warning: Make sure you have at least one OAuth account connected before removing your password.

errors.onlyLoginMethod: Cannot remove password. It's your only login method. Please connect an OAuth account first.
errors.alreadyExists: Password already exists. Use the change password option instead.

successMessages.removed: Password removed successfully. You can now only sign in with OAuth.
successMessages.set: Password set successfully. You can now sign in with email/password.

loginMethods.title: Login Methods
loginMethods.description: Manage how you sign in to your account

account.title: Delete Account
account.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data
account.confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove all associated data from our servers.

validation.invalidJsonArray: Invalid JSON format or not an array of messages.

project.title: Current Hub
project.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This action cannot be undone.
project.deleteWarning: Once you delete a project, there is no going back. Please be careful.

workspace.title: Current Workspace
workspace.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this profile? This action cannot be undone.
workspace.deleteWarning: Once you delete a workspace, there is no going back. Please be careful.

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the appearance of the application
